name: Tritri
description:
Want to get in to a block game hypnosis? Welcome to Tritri!

The game in bullets:

  • Intuitive gameplay
  • Trippy backgrounds
  • Simple controls
  • Why aren't all block games this easy going!?
  • Dynamic original soundtrack
  • Retro 8-bit feeling
  • One try takes about 1 minute
  • Local highscore
  • Super easy to understand - super hard to master
